data.name: Kargo
data.detailed_description:
Kargo is a 2D cave-flyer with a focus on puzzle elements. Your goal is to deliver cargo containers to their designated targets. Navigate your spaceship through the levels with Asteroids-like controls. Gates are color-coded and either open or close when the corresponding cargo item is present. Figure out the right order in which to collect cargo, use them as keys and deliver them to their targets.

The game was designed for small screen sizes and controllers, so it's best played on the Steam Deck (or similar handheld consoles).

More details about the game and GIFs coming soon...
